nodes.bodyText: Maybe also add something like: These files can be found under include/kframework/builtin/ in your installation directory.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,22 @@
+---
+copyright: Copyright (c) 2020 K Team. All Rights Reserved.
+---
+
+K Builtins
+==========
+
+The K Builtins (also referred to as the K Prelude or the K Standard Library)
+consists of several files which contain definitions that make working with K
+simpler.

nodes.bodyText:
Added this:
These files can be found under `include/kframework/builtin` in your K
installation directory, and can be imported with `requires "FILENAME"` (without
the path prefix).
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,22 @@
+---

+---

+==========
+
